basicInfo.name: Pon
basicInfo.flavor: After much pondering, Pon has decided to go on a journey. He calls himself a traveler, but has yet to leave the forest.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spinning Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 205% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Aggressive Nature
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 21%.

profile.story:
Pon is a cute but extremely stubborn and prideful lesser panda beastkin. He looks up to the heroic deeds of Silvesta and strives to become a just and free-spirited adventurer just like him.
However, since Silvesta's travels ended in catastrophe, the tail end of his adventure is not known, and what is known is scattered far and few between the various tall tales bards created.
Pon's clan was rescued by Silvesta on his journey, though, so Pon and his village remain fond of Silvesta regardless of his journey's outcome.
This is a large part of why Pon looks up to Silvesta so much.

basicInfo.name: Pon
basicInfo.flavor: Pon has equipped himself with items he collected from all over Terra. His new equipment seems to have made him even more stubborn than he was before.

basicInfo.name: Pon
basicInfo.flavor: It is said that Pon got his name from being called the Pondering Panda. He is very stubborn and proud.
